pr_title: Apache Geode instrumentation should store normalized queries as db.statement

timeline.bodyText: If this is just a simple wrapper, why do we need it?
timeline.author: iNikem

replies.bodyText: Just for the try-catch right now. In the (close) future we'll also check if the normalization is enabled (I'll add appropriate config flags in #1431)
replies.author: mateuszrzeszutek

timeline.message: Apache Geode instrumentation should store normalized queries as db.statement
